Text:
The proper title for this movie is"
Captain America: The First Avenger"


And we already have 290 different seeded torrents of it:
https://thepiratebay.org/search/Captain%20America*/0/7/200

BTW, 8.4 GB is an enormous size for an AVI file.
The entire DVD disc image would not be that large.
This indicates that you are quite clueless when it comes to creating AVI files of a predetermined size.
Get yourself a copy of AutoGK -->  http://www.free-codecs.com/download/autogk.htm
Then you can start creating proper AVI rips.
